definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Do you have a good remedy for fatigued eyes?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有好的治疗法可以治我疲劳的眼睛？

sentences.english: "warming and tonifying", external methods would be availabl…
sentences.chinese: 兼用外治疗法对血证能取急效。

sentences.english: Best remedied by iron or B12 supplements, and eating red meat and green vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 最好的治疗法是补充B12，吃牛羊肉和绿色食物。

sentences.english: Bevacizumab treatment was associated with a low rate of serious adverse events.
sentences.chinese: 贝伐单抗治疗法与低概率的严重不良反应有关。

sentences.english: No, I don't recommend endodontic treatment for this condition.
sentences.chinese: 不，在这种情况下我不介绍你采用牙根管治疗法。

sentences.english: Part of the reason for having no cancer "cure" is semantics.
sentences.chinese: 其实，说没有癌症“治疗法”的部分原因是用词不当。
兼用外治疗法对血证能取急效。
她的菜园也是一种治疗法。

sentences.english: The accident victim was hooked up to a drip administering intravenous fluids.
sentences.chinese: 打点滴，输液，静脉输液治疗法。

sentences.english: Since then, the study of psychedelic psychotherapy has been limited.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后，有关迷幻剂治疗法的研究也受到了限制。

sentences.english: Also mentioned the relationship of the music therapy and Scarlatti's sonatas.
sentences.chinese: 其中还提到了音乐治疗法与斯卡拉蒂奏鸣曲的关系。

definition: acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
